[Goloma Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2807) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You lived an insulated life focused on avoiding danger. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) and [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Goloma Lore](/Traits.aspx?ID=381).
